entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then a few flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
